DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study Two Oral Bemiparin Formulations
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy volunteer : male female subject age 18 45 year 2 . Body weight : 6580 Kg 3 . Not meaningful abnormality physical examination clinical history 4 . Without evidence significant organic psychiatric illness 5 . Hemogram , biochemistry coagulation normal value establish reference range local hospital laboratory 6 . Vital sign ( blood pressure , heart beat rate body temperature ) EKG within normal range 7 . Healthy volunteer participate another clinical trial do past 2 month 8 . Not give blood last 4 week . 9 . Healthy male volunteer receive heparin past 10 . Healthy male volunteer accept participate study sign write informed consent 11. contraceptive method double barrel sterile surgery 1 . Previous history alcoholism , drug dependency , drug abuse habitual psychoactive drug consumption 2 . Important consumption excite drink : alcohol consumption > 30 g/day ; coffee , tea , cola > 5 /day 3 . Allergy , idiosyncrasy hypersensitivity medicine 4 . Healthy volunteer receive another medication past 15 day 5 . Positive serology hepatitis B , C HIV 6 . Cardiovascular , respiratory , renal , hepatic , endocrine , gastrointestinal , hematologic , psychiatric , neurological others event 7 . Mayor Surgery last 6 month 8 . Smoking > 10 cigarette / day 9 . Ethanol , cannabis , cocaine , amphetamine , benzodiazepin opiate urine 10 . Healthy volunteer familiar history evident hemorrhagic episodes 11. positive fecatest comburtest 12. positive pregnant test 13 . Bemiparin contraindication
